author: IGN
description: Watch the Street Fighter Chun-Li Gameplay Reveal Trailer for Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves, the latest installment to the fighting game series developed by SNK. The legendary Chun-Li from Street Fighter is making her way to Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves. Take a look at the latest trailer to see Chun-Li gameplay in Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves, coming to the game in Winter 2025 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves x Street Fighter - Official Chun-Li Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo has won a lawsuit against a streamer who pirated games and livestreamed them ahead of their release dates.

The pirate, Jesse "EveryGameGuru" Keighin, infamously wrote to Nintendo "boasting" that he had "a thousand burner channels” to stream from and threatened to continue to use them, saying he could "do this all day." "You might run a corporation, but I run the streets," he wrote on social media at the time. He has now been ordered to pay $17,500 in damages.
title: Nintendo Wins Lawsuit Against Pirate Who Boasted '...I Run The Streets' - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Walk through a place filled with long-forgotten memories, shadows of the past, and traces of hope.
A small town, eerie and unsettling yet so intriguing, calling for discoveries. Welcome to Raven Brooks. Watch the latest Hello Neighbor 3 trailer for this upcoming action game and take a tour of Raven Brooks. Sign-ups for a Prototype 3 Playtest are available via Steam.

#IGN #gaming
title: Hello Neighbor 3 - Official 'Welcome to Raven Brooks' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Tides of Madness' Season Trailer for Asphalt Legends, the hit arcade free-to-play racing game developed by Gameloft. Players can take to the chilling tracks in the latest 'Tides of Madness' Season. Race with the Neon Lykan or the 918 Spyder, with an all-new Scotland track. The 'Tides of Madness' Season for Asphalt Legends is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, iOS, Android, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #gaming
title: Asphalt Legends - Official 'Tides of Madness' Season Trailer

author: IGN
description: Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch. This week Daemon, Max, Logan, and Ryan discuss Halo coming to PlayStation and what seems to be the end of Xbox having any notable exclusives going forward. When you combine this with Microsoft’s current messaging that everything is an Xbox, the fact they let someone else make the first Xbox handheld, and heavy hints from leadership that the next Xbox console will basically be  a PC that can play a bunch of PlayStation games, it kind of looks like Xbox is just done competing with Sony on a hardware level. Is this the end of an era? Are the console wars actually over? Plus we have last week's poll results and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.
title: Xbox Surrenders the Console War - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Release Date Announcement Trailer for Service with a Shotgun, a wave-based visual novel shooting game developed by Nolyn Vansyckle. Players will embody a man down on his luck as he defends a roadside shop from certain doom against a zombie apocalypse. Keep the pressure high in Service with a Shotgun, launching on November 6 for PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Service with a Shotgun - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Animated Video for A Danny Elfman Christmas Story, a haunting tale from the mind of Danny Elfman. Join the renowned musician and composer on a spooky adventure in A Danny Elfman Christmas Story.

Drawn and animated by Pete Carsillo entirely in Procreate and Procreate Dreams, "on an iPad."

Credits: 
Written and Narrated by: Danny Elfman
Animation, Character, and Production Design: Pete Carsillo 
Editing and Visual Effects: Jon Mann-Krieger 
Sound Recording and Sound Editing: Melisa McGregor
Fireside Photography: Bridget Fonda & Oliver Elfman
Music by: Bartholomew Zanzibar III

#ign
title: A Danny Elfman Christmas Story - Official Animated Video (2025)

description:

author: IGN
description:
Europa Universalis 5 reviewed by Leana Hafer on PC.

Europa Universalis 5 might be the most on-paper impressive historical strategy game of all time, with its depth of simulation, ultra detailed map and demographics, and flavorful depiction of the half millennium that brought us from the middle ages into the modern world. At the moment, though, it is definitely hurting for some polish, particularly when it comes to general balance, tuning, and AI behavior. It doesn't really feel entirely done yet, and that's what you should probably expect if you decide to brave it as an early adopter. That being said, I think the foundation is very strong. Paradox has focused on the right things to maximize EU5's long-term potential – perhaps at the cost of day one smoothness – as long as these devs can manage to wrangle its eminence effectively. The systems are excellent, and it's already an ocean-deep, exciting wargame and nation manager. With time and care, it could achieve hegemon status in the g
title: Europa Universalis 5 Review

author: IGN
description:

#IGN #CallOfDuty  #BlackOps7

Don't miss the Beta Test 2 Trailer for Arknights: Endfield, an upcoming action anime RPG developed by Hypergryph. 

Players will explore the world of Talos-2 to take out enemies, gather resources, and uncover deep truths. Beta Test 2 for Arknights: Endfield is launching on November 28 for iOS, Android, and PC, with a PlayStation 5 (PS5) Technical Test coming at a later date.

#IGN #ArknightsEndfield #Action
title: Arknights: Endfield - Official Beta Test 2 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Live-Action Trailer for Battlefield REDSEC, the latest Battlefield battle royale developed by EA, Battlefield Studios, and DICE. Players of all walks of life, in all scenarios of work, can come together to squad up and head into the fray of Fort Lyndon. Survive the lethal ring of fire and reign victorious in Battlefield REDSEC, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#BattlefieldREDSEC #Gaming #IGN
title: Battlefield REDSEC - Official Live-Action Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Every faction dreams of a perfect future, but only one vision can survive the frost. Build your utopia… or watch it shatter. Watch the latest Frostpunk 2 trailer for the city-building strategy survival game to see what's coming with the Fractured Utopias DLC. 

Factured Utopias features 8 unique faction utopias, 8 unique faction skill trees, 8 new factin hubs, 8 new variants of housing districts, over 100 narrative events, 2 premium tales: 'Doomsayers' and 'Plague,' and 1 new map. Frostpunk 2: Fractured Utopias will be available on PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG), PlayStation 5 (PS5), PC Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, and Windows on December 8, 2025.

#IGN #Frostpunk2 #Frostpunk2DLC
title: Frostpunk 2: Fractured Utopias - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get your first look at pre-alpha gameplay from Kaiju Cleanup, the upcoming first-person cleaning game in which you must clean up your city in the aftermath of kaiju battles, cleaning up the blood and toxins and carving up corpses of giant kaijus after they've fought to the death in your city. This early look at gameplay is narrated by Brightrock Games Producer Mitch Binding and Game Designer Cordelia Chui. Wishlist Kaiju Cleanup on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3729700/Kaiju_Cleanup/

#IGN #gaming
title: Kaiju Cleanup: Exclusive Developer Gameplay Commentary

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Sidekicks Overview Trailer for Fortnite, the hit battle royale game developed by Epic Games. 

Players will never be alone in battle with Sidekicks, a new cosmetic companion that will follow your every move in battle, is immune to damage, and invisible to enemies in-game. 

Customize a Sidekick and earn Sidekick Points to unlock new rewards in Fortnite, launching on November 1.

#IGN #Fortnite #FortniteNewContent
title: Fortnite - Official Sidekicks Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection in this latest trailer for the upcoming RPG adventure. 

Palamutes, new allies, an encounter with the living mountain, Yama Tsukami, and much more await you beyond the Meridian. 

Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection will be available on Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC/Steam on March 13, 2026.

#IGN #MonsterHunterStories3 #RPG
title: Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection - Official Pre-order Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Menace full cinematic trailer for this upcoming sci-fi turn-based tactics game. The full cinematic trailer Menace was created in partnership with developer Overhype Studios, director Syama Pedersen (Warhammer 40K fan video “Astartes”, and contributor on the “And They Shall Know No Fear” episode of Amazon’s Secret Level anthology) and Hoplite VFX. In the Menace cinematic trailer, watch Republic Marines and Pirates clash in a derelict factory, before the dead on both sides get absorbed and repurposed by the insidious lifeform plaguing the wayback system. 

In Menace, lead a strike force of marines, misfits, and miscreants in the Wayback system, a lawless frontier far from the core worlds, beset by pirates, warlords, morally bankrupt corporations, and fractured local governments who struggle for dominance. Aboard the TCRN Impetus, players will lead an ensemble cast of colourful characters who will lead their forces, whether that’s fielding mechs, tanks, or infantry squads.
title: Menace - Official Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Azuria and Vermeil, two countries on a path to destruction through the flames of war. As hope is extinguished and the shadow of despair looms, take on the role of a Rider, and along with your trusted Rathalos, friends and monstie allies, set out on a fateful journey for the truth. 

Discover an adventure like no other in Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection, combining our unique take on turn-based RPGs and monster taming, with the world of Monster Hunter! 

Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection launches on Nintendo Switch 2, PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC/Steam on March 13, 2026!

#IGN #MonsterHunterStories3 #RPG
title: Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection - Official "Introduction" Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Plants vs Zombies Halloween Event Trailer for Golf Clash, the hit mobile arcade golfing game developed by Playdemic. Players can get into the spooky mood with the upcoming Halloween Event, based on Plants vs Zombies. Gain access to the Golden Shot, two event-specific balls, and a new course to play on called Zombotany Ranch. The Plants vs Zombies Halloween Event Trailer for Golf Clash kicks off on November 3 for iOS and Android.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Golf Clash x Plants vs Zombies - Official Halloween Event Trailer
